name: Dell Inspiron 7415 AMD Ryzen 7 (14 inch, 16GB, 512GB, Windows 10, MS Office 2019, AMD Radeon Graphics, FHD LED Display, Pebble Green, D560472WIN9P)

prod_desc.heading: Why buy Dell Inspiron 7415 Ryzen 7 Windows 10 Home 2-in-1 Laptop
features: AMD Radeon Graphics to play high-end games
14-Inch Full HD Touch Display to get the ultimate visuals
16GB DDR4 RAM for smooth using experience
AMD Ryzen 7 5700U Processor for fast performance
512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD to store all your files
sub_features: Amplify your computing experience as the Dell Inspiron 7415 Ryzen 7 Windows 10 Home 2-in-1 Laptop features the latest advancements delivering efficient performance. The processor is here to deliver you a smooth experience like never before. Loaded with Windows 10 Home Single Language operating system helps you perform a user-friendly operation. Witness the super-smooth operation with the AMD Ryzen 7 5700U Processor that takes your performance to a whole new level. It never lets you slow down in terms of efficiency so that the quality and quantity of your work is never hampered. Equipped with best-in-class graphical performance, this laptop is all ready to step up your gaming experience.

Enjoy lightning-fast speed as soon as you buy Dell Inspiron 7415 Ryzen 7 Windows 10 Home 2-in-1 Laptop. This laptop comes with a serious storage capacity of 512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD to make it more efficient and productive which lets you store all your files within this laptop. It is equipped with AMD Radeon Graphics which gives the ultimate gaming feel. Experience the speedy performance with advanced specifications, this laptop is one of the best laptops available in the market. Having 16GB DDR4 RAM, you can revel in powerful performance without interrupting your streaming, or videos. Now, maintain the perfect balance between demanding games and intense deadlines without any fallback.

Stay in sync with the latest technology by bringing home the Dell Inspiron 7415 Ryzen 7 Windows 10 Home 2-in-1 Laptop online. It is equipped with a 14-inch FHD touch display (1920 x 1080 pixels) that allows you to enjoy watching videos and playing games with full clarity. This laptop is a perfect choice for modern tech-oriented people which comes with Dell active pen support. Escape the toneless routine and immerse yourself in the action with Waves Maxxaudio pro. Amplify your experience with rich sound and hear every detail with crystal clear audio quality to take your gameplay to another level. So, go ahead and order the Dell Inspiron 7415 Ryzen 7 Windows 10 Home 2-in-1 Laptop online, right now!

faqs.que: How long do Dell laptops usually last?
faqs.ans: Most experts estimate a laptop's lifespan to be three to five years. It may survive longer than that, but its utility will be limited as the components become less capable of running advanced applications.

faqs.que: How many years Dell battery lasts?
faqs.ans: When Should I Consider Replacing the Battery? All rechargeable batteries wear out with time and usage. As time and cumulative use increase, the performance will degrade. For the typical user, noticeable reduction in run time generally will be observed after 18 to 24 months.

faqs.que: At what percentage should I charge my Dell laptop?
faqs.ans: The recommended charging time should not exceed 1 hour. Typically, this should charge the battery to between 80% and 100%. (Some discharge will take place over time.)

faqs.que: How do I keep my laptop battery healthy?
faqs.ans: Like all batteries, lithium-ion cells age and deteriorate over time and with use. To help extend battery life and performance, try to keep the battery level between 20% and 80% several times a week instead of using your device for only a short amount of time, and then plugging it in to recharge the battery.
